#Factores
```{r}
arr.personas<-sample(c("M", "F"), 15, replace = T)
arr.personas
```
```{r}
fct.personas<-factor(arr.personas)
fct.personas
```

```{r}
fct.personas<-factor(arr.personas, 
                     levels = c("M", "F"),
                     label=c("Hombre", "Mujer")
                     )
fct.personas
```

```{r}
levels(fct.personas)
```
```{r}
table(fct.personas)
```
```{r}
freqq<-table(fct.personas)/length(fct.personas)
freqq
```
